Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man, also known as Ishvi (יִשְׁוִי) whose real name probably was Eshbaal (אֶשְׁבַּעַל) but which was changed in order to remove any reference to Baal (בַּעַל) ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► succeeded his father as king of the northern tribes until he was assassinated and David (דָּוִד) took his place
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= side of a person's body, especially of the rump, right above the hip; ► place where people sometimes carried their small children; ≈ location where one's body is unprotected and vulnerable
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= field, ◄ near Gibeon (גִּבְעֹון)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► one of the four Hivite (חִוִּי) cities that made a covenant with Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
literally: hard; hence: = state in which an event takes place with intensity
= state in which an event takes place with a strong intensity

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= woman; ◄ daughter of Nahash (נָחָשׁ) ► sister of David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= man, also known as Abshai (אַבְשַׁי) ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans leave the main road to interrupt their journey or take a side road
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= the side of the human body which is to the north when facing the direction of the rising sun; in extension: one option as opposed to another
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans leave the main road to interrupt their journey or take a side road
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other
= the side of the human body which is to the north when facing the direction of the rising sun; in extension: one option as opposed to another

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= things in someone's possession, such as clothes and weapons
= state in which someone is willing to do something
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= area located below diaphragm, containing stomach and bowels and other contents

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= man, also known as Abshai (אַבְשַׁי) ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= hill, ◄ located before Giah (גִּיחַ) on the way to Gibeon (גִּבְעֹון) ► place where Abner (אַבְנֵר) confronted Joab (יֹואָב)
= hill; ◄ located near Giah (גִּיחַ) on the road to the wilderness of Gibeon (גִּבְעֹון)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= location; ◄ on the way to the wilderness of Gibeon (גִּבְעֹון)

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► one of the four Hivite (חִוִּי) cities that made a covenant with Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)

Node.gloss: to come together|to gather|to assemble|to rally|to (re)unite
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= group ◄ of people ► united for a common purpose
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
poetic term: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, usually in the future
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= state in which condition or action is motivated or accompanied by deep distress
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= reference to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to turn back from|to give up|to retire from
Node.definition: literally: to turn (from an activity); hence: = action by which humans or deities stop being engaged in a certain activity
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= marker indicating that if the event in focus would not have been true another event would not haven taken place

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent pointing to a specific condition or circumstance
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= action by which humans move away from a certain location
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
meaning unsure; possibly: = the first half of the day|meaning unsure; possibly: = an area east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) River
= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד) ► assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) capital of kingdom of Isboseth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) son of Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which humans or animals notice that someone or something that is expected to be present or available is missing

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which a countable entity is nine in number
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man; ◄ son of Ner (נֵר) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► army commander of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) and his son Ish Bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת) father of Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל) officer in charge of his tribe, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is sixty in number
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► ancestral town of King David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to be light|to become light|to shine
Node.definition: = process by which something reflects light; ≈ associated with well being
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
